TextView.tools:text: There's no relative direction in the vastness of space, a Starfleet high mucky-muck tells Enterprise Captain James T. Kirk (Chris Pine) in Star Trek Beyond. There's only you.She's asking him whether he wants to give up his captain's seat for a chance at a powerful desk job on the eve of his thirtieth birthday, a year younger than his father was when he died. Her language is meant to spur Kirk to look inward, and for a moment we might hope that he will, and that the film will look inward with him.
